channel.title: Update 9.7 on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Update 9.7 on Home

item.title: Tier X Tanks
item.description: The Best Performing Tanks Highest Relative WR The graph shows the tanks with the highest Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Players
item.description: Battles per Player The graph shows the number of battles fought per player during the update 9.7. On average, players played 253 battles and the median battle count was 93. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.

item.title: Career stats
item.description: This page shows statistics of players’ battles fought during their Blitz “career” until the end of update 9.7. In total, 2.1M players played during update 9.7. Battles per Player Number of career/cumulative battles per player in the end of the update 9.
